My colleague also had to stop using it because she was having a reaction as well. She said sheâ€™s been using cerave for years without issue but started getting a rash under her eyes for a few weeks, unknown why until she stopped using this product and it went away. Iâ€™ve also found multiple stories online regarding reactions to it. Clearly thereâ€™s something else in this product that isnâ€™t natural. I am pretty disappointed as I am a PA and it makes me sad that unsafe products are being sold but marketed as safe.
